ekpmeasure.control.instruments.misc.main module¶

ekpmeasure.control.instruments.misc.main.get_number_and_suffix(string)¶

Return number and suffix of a string.

Parameters

string (str) – String.

Returns

number, suffix

Return type

(tuple)

Examples

` >>> get_number_and_suffix('1khz') > (1.0, 'khz') `
